Service Details: Community service group that provides volunteers and support for a variety of community and international projects
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and upMembership is by invitation and is open to any man or woman in the community.
How to Apply: To express interest please contact us by email
Cost: Membership - No cost to join. Annual dues presently $70.00 per year.
Meetings: 2nd and 4th Wednesdays, 6pm, Westbank Lions Community Centre, 2466 Main Street, Westbank
